original_text: So Jonathan called David and told him the whole conversation. He brought him to Saul, and David was with Saul as before.
korean_text: 요나단이 다윗을 불러 그 모든 일을 그에게 알리고 요나단이 그를 사울에게로 인도하니 그가 사울 앞에 전과 같이 있었더라

sentences.original_text: and told him the whole conversation
and David was with Saul as before
